confirmed_task:
1. Go to http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: The login page appears 

2. Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123 
Test Assertions: You are logged in and the message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed 

3. Go to My Whish List 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed. 

4. Select the "Sports & Outdoors" category and the "Sports" sub-category 
Test Assertions: The "Sports" page appears 

5. Click on the heart symbol of any item. 
Test Assertions: The "My Wish List" page is displayed, with the selected item. 

6. Click on "Remove item". 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed.

1. Go to http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: The OneStopMarket page appears 

2. Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123 
Test Assertions: You are logged in and the message Welcome, Emma Lopez! is displayed 

3. Go to My Whish List 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed. 

4. Select the "Home & Kitchen" category and the "Bedding" sub-category and the "Kids' Bedding" sub-sub-category. 
Test Assertions: Kids' Bedding" page is displayed 

5. Click on the bar chart icon of the first item in the list. 
Test Assertions: The item appears in My Whish List 

6. Select the "Home & Kitchen" category and the "Bedding" sub-category and the "Kids' Bedding" sub-sub-category. 
Test Assertions: Kids' Bedding" page displayed 

7. Click on the heart icon of the third item in the list. 
Test Assertions: You have 2 items on your Wish List 

8. Add both items to the Cart with the "Add All to Cart" button 
Test Assertions: Two error messages appear, indicating that options are required. You are still on the "My Whish List" page 

9. Remove the two items for the Wish List. 
Test Assertions: The message "You have no items in your wish list." is displayed. 

10. Sign out 
Test Assertions: The message "You are Signed out" appears then after 5 seconds the Home page is displayed.

1. Navigate to One Stop Market website at http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: Home page loads with category navigation menu visible 

2. Click on "Sports & Outdoors" > "Exercise & Fitness" 
Test Assertions: Exercise & Fitness category page loads  

3. Scroll down and click on LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts 
Test Assertions: Product page loads with details, price ($11.89), and options visible 

4. Choose Color "01-blue" and Size "Medium" 
Test Assertions: Options are selected and reflected in the UI 

5. Set Quantity to 1 and click "Add to Cart" 
Test Assertions: Error message appears: "Could not add LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts... to your shopping cart." 

6. Navigate to Shopping Cart page 
Test Assertions: Cart page loads showing the added item with correct details and pricing 

7. Review cart contents:
Item: LEIYAN Mens Linen Shorts
Color: 01-blue
Size: Medium
Quantity: 1
Price: $11.89
Subtotal: $11.89
Shipping: $5.00 (Flat Rate - Fixed)
Order Total: $16.89 
Test Assertions: All features are correct

1. Navigate to One Stop Market website at http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/ 
Test Assertions: Home page loads but "Create an Account" link is invisible 

2. Click on "Create an Account" link 
Test Assertions: Create New Customer Account loads 

3. Complete Account Form by filling in:
First Name: Emma
Last Name: Lopez
Email: emma.lopez@gmail.com
Password: Password123
Confirm Password: Password123
Check "Sign Up for Newsletter"
Check "Show Password" 
Test Assertions: All fields populate correctly, password strength shows as "Very Strong" 

4. Click "Create an Account" 
Test Assertions: Error message appears, indicating that the account already exists

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. The message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed at the right on the top of the page. 

2. Enter Email and Password fields.  (emma.lopez@gmail.com and Password.123)
Click on the buton "Sign In". 
Test Assertions: I'm connected on the website. The screen "My Account" is displayed. 
The message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed at the right on the top of the page.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Enter Email and Password fields.  (emma.lopez@gmail.com and Password.123)
Click on the buton "Sign In". 
Test Assertions: The login failed and I am back on the login screen 

3. Click on tab "Sign out" 
Test Assertions: I'm disconnected.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed.
The tab "Create an account" is displayed. 

2. Click on the tab "Create an account". 
Test Assertions: An error page is displayed saying registrations are closed 

3. Fill in the fields:
 - First Name
 - Last Name
 - Email
 - Password
 - Confirm Password.
Click on the button "Create an Account" 
Test Assertions: The account is created.
The page "My account" is displayed with a message "Thank you for registering with Main Website Store".

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Sign In with Email "emma.lopez@gmail.com" and Password "Password.123". 
Test Assertions: I'm connected on the website. The screen "My Account" is displayed. 
The message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed at the right on the top of the page. 

3. Click on the tab "My Account" 
Test Assertions: The page "My account" is displayed. 

4. On the "Address Book" section, click on the link "Manage Addresses" 
Test Assertions: The page "Adress Book" is displayed. 

5. Click on the button "Add Credit Card" 
Test Assertions: The page "Add New Address" is displayed. 

6. Fill in the missing mandatories fields.
 - Phone Number
 - Street Address
 - State/Province
 - City
 - Zip/Postal Code
Click on the button "Save Address". 
Test Assertions: The page "Adress Book" is displayed with a confirmation message "You saved the address".
New Adress appears in "Additional Address Entries" section.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Type on the search field.
Click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: An error message says that search is disabled

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Click on the link "My Wish List". 
Test Assertions: The page "Advanced Search" is displayed. 

3. Fill in "Product Name". (ex: "one plus")
Click on the button "Search". 
Test Assertions: The page "Catalog Advanced Search" is displayed.
The result of the search is displayed with the criteria selected.
A warning message is diplayed with a link to modify the search. 

4. Click on the link "Modify your search". 
Test Assertions: The page "Advanced Search" is displayed.
The field "Product Name" is already filled. 

5. Modify "Product Name". ("oneplus")
Click on the button "Search". 
Test Assertions: The page "Catalog Advanced Search" is displayed.
The result of the search is displayed with the criteria selected.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Type on the search field.
Click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The screen "Search" is displayed. 
The result of the search is displayed. 

3. Click on the button "Add to cart" of any item of the result page. (ex: "Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 ") 
Test Assertions: The message "You added Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 to your shopping cart."
The item selected has been added on the cart. 

4. Click on the "My Account" link 
Test Assertions: A popup appears.
The item added appears on the cart.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Type on the search field.
Click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The screen "Search" is displayed. 
The result of the search is displayed. 

3. Click on the button "Add to cart" of any item of the result page. (ex: "Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 ") 
Test Assertions: The message "You added Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 to your shopping cart."
The item selected has been added on the cart. 

4. Click on the item's picture you added to the cart 
Test Assertions: A popup appears.
The item added appears on the cart. 

5. Click on the button "View and Edit Cart". 
Test Assertions: The page "Shopping Cart" is displayed.
 

6. Click on the button "Remove item". 
Test Assertions: The item have been removed from the cart.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Click on the "Home" logo.
Type on the search field. 
Test Assertions: The screen "Cell Phones & Accessories" is displayed. 
The result of the search is displayed.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123 
Test Assertions: You are logged in and the message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed 

3. Click on the "Home" logo 
Test Assertions: The screen "Cell Phones & Accessories" is displayed.  

4. Click on the picture"heart" of any item of the result page. (ex: "Dilwe1 12'' Phone Screen Magnifier, HD Mobile Phone Magnifier Projector Screen, Foldable Phone Stand with Screen Amplifier for Movies Videos") 
Test Assertions: The page "My Wish List" is displayed.
The item ("Dilwe1 12'' Phone Screen Magnifier, HD Mobile Phone Magnifier Projector Screen, Foldable Phone Stand with Screen Amplifier for Movies Videos") is displayed.
A confirmation message "
Dilwe1 12'' Phone Screen Magnifier, HD Mobile Phone Magnifier Projector Screen, Foldable Phone Stand with Screen Amplifier for Movies Videos has been added to your Wish List. Click here to continue shopping." is displayed.
 

5. Click on the link "Remove item". 
Test Assertions: The page "My Wish List" is displayed.
A confirmation message "
Dilwe1 12'' Phone Screen Magnifier, HD Mobile Phone Magnifier Projector Screen, Foldable Phone Stand with Screen Amplifier for Movies Videos has been removed from your Wish List." is displayed.
The item doesn't appears in the wish list.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Log in with the following details: emma.lopez@gmail.com / Password.123 
Test Assertions: You are logged in and the message "Welcome, Emma Lopez!" is displayed 

3. Type  "OnePlus" on the search field.
Click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The result of the search is displayed. 

4. Click on the button "Add to cart" of any item of the result page. (ex: "Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 ") 
Test Assertions: The message "You added Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 to your shopping cart."
The item selected has been added on the cart. 

5. Click on the picture "Cart". 
Test Assertions: A popup appears.
The item added appears on the cart. 

6. Click on "Proceed to checkout". 
Test Assertions: The "Shipping Address" page is displayed. 

7. Click on the button "Abort". 
Test Assertions: The "Payment Method" page is displayed. 

8. Click on button "Place Order". 
Test Assertions: A page of confirmation is displayed with message "Thank you for your purchase!"
The cart is empty.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Type "oneplus" on the search field.
Click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The screen "Search" is displayed. 
The result of the search is displayed. 

3. Click on the button "Add to Compare" for 1 item of the result page. (ex: "Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 ") 
Test Assertions: The message "You added product Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 to the comparison list."
The item selected has been added.
Compare list appears on the left menu. 

4. Click on the button "Add to Compare" for 1 item of the result page. (ex: [2-Pack] HPTech Tempered Glass for OnePlus 6T, OnePlus 6T McLaren and OnePlus 7 Screen Protector, Easy to Install, Bubble Free, 9H Hardness, Case Friendly ) 
Test Assertions: An error message is displayed saying the item is out of stock 

5. On the left menu, Click on "Compare". 
Test Assertions: The "Compare Products" page is displayed.

1. Type "http://www.vtaas-benchmark.com:7770/" on the url bar.
And click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The Welcome page of web "OneStopShop" is displayed. 

2. Type "oneplus" on the search field.
Click on "Enter". 
Test Assertions: The screen "Search" is displayed. 
The result of the search is displayed. 

3. Click on the button "Add to Compare" for 1 item of the result page. (ex: "Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 ") 
Test Assertions: The message "You added product Rexin OnePlus 7 pro Warp Charger, 30W Power Adapter [5V 6A] + OnePlus USB-C Fast Charging Cable 1M / 3.3FT Data Cable for OnePlus7 6T 6 5T 5 to the comparison list."
The item selected has been added.
Compare list appears on the left menu. 

4. Click on the button "Add to Compare" for 1 item of the result page. (ex: [2-Pack] HPTech Tempered Glass for OnePlus 6T, OnePlus 6T McLaren and OnePlus 7 Screen Protector, Easy to Install, Bubble Free, 9H Hardness, Case Friendly ) 
Test Assertions: The message "You added product [2-Pack] HPTech Tempered Glass for OnePlus 6T, OnePlus 6T McLaren and OnePlus 7 Screen Protector, Easy to Install, Bubble Free, 9H Hardness, Case Friendly to the comparison list."
The item selected has been added.
Compare list on the left menu is updated. 

5. On the left menu, Click on "Clear All". 
Test Assertions: The list is empty. 

6. Click on the button "OK". 
Test Assertions: The list is empty.
The message "You have no items to compare." is displayed
